channel.title: "error connecting to server"
channel.description:
i runned my server,started hamachi,my friend joined my hamachi,my friend runned my client but he still gets "error connecting to server" when he try to login...
how can i fix this?

item.title: "error connecting to server"
item.dc:creator: @blindlypowa blindlypowa
item.description:
@blindlypowa wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:2, topic:428433”][quote author=nicke924 link=topic=483032.msg3537539#msg3537539 date=1300645355]
Give your client to your friends and they try. I always log on localhost/127.0.0.1 and they use my no-ip/hamachi
[/quote]

Try this, not sure if this will be the sulution. Be sure your run.bat is on and hamachi control centre is on.[/quote]

im doing all this…and it isn’t working

Read full topic

item.title: "error connecting to server"
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[Delta]How to connect to no-ip ip?

Give your client to your friends and they try. I always log on localhost/127.0.0.1 and they use my no-ip/hamachi

Try this, not sure if this will be the sulution. Be sure your run.bat is on and hamachi control centre is on.
